name: Segway With Camel Ride
description: Prospect Outback Adventures combines two of the most captivating and unique tours worldwide, Segway Adventure and Camel Safari. After a safety briefing you will begin exploring a 980 acre property by Segway! Feel the thrill as you guide your machine along a rustic route surrounded by lush tropical jungle. View the properties great house and gardens. Watch as "Farmer Joe" climbs a 30 ft coconut tree and then sample fresh fruits of the season. Continue your adventure to Camel Park. Here experienced camel trainers will give you a brief orientation, while you wait to saddle up. Enjoy this amazing trek with your new companion. See how docile your new friends are as you ride along sandy paths through wooded forests. Pet and have your picture taken with these amazing, gentle giants. After this unique experience, Segway back to the tour center. Enjoy shopping for unique souvenirs and take a walk though the large bird aviary. Mingle with and feed exotic and colorful free flying birds. A day of memories you'll never forget!
